Package index

Find and fix lints

fix() fix_dir() fix_package() fix_text()
Automatically replace lints
lint() lint_dir() lint_package() lint_text()

Get the list of linters in flint

Setup flint
setup_flint_gha()
Create a Github Actions workflow for flint

Update the flint setup
